title: Picking for Each Other
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>I got a message from Yoshiko-chan yesterday that Karin helped her coordinate some outfits. Look.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Wow, they look fantastic! ...Those outfits are a bit different from how Yoshiko-san usually dresses. They have a darker and more mature feel to them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Right!? I bet she can‚Äôt wait to show us in person the next time we hang out together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Karin-san is amazing at coordinating outfits! I wish I could be like her and have a good fashion sense.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I think you‚Äôre fashionable enough.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>No, I‚Äôm still learning.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Then, how about we pick out clothes for each other as practice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Sure! It‚Äôll be a learning experience!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Okay, let‚Äôs head to a shopping mall. I know a store that sells clothes that would look good on you! ùÖ†<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Wow, okay! I‚Äôll pick out some perfect outfits for you, too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
